name: Decanting Network
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Allowed 1 extra Colonist. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site. DESTINATION: 2002 TX (9:50).
imageDescription: Card depicting two scientists in white lab coats working with cryogenic pods, showing human bodies being prepared for coldnap hibernation.

name: Life Support Test Protocol
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Implant is a free action. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site; you may Discard a Colonist (this is not a Felony). DESTINATION: Quaoar with Promoted Bernal (10:40).
imageDescription: Card showing a spacecraft near Quaoar, a reddish-pink trans-Neptunian object, with the dwarf planet prominently displayed against a starfield.

name: Life Support Reconfig Team
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Your Bernals add to Colonist limit even when unanchored. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank; you may swap your Bernal cards (move each to the other Bernal Stack). DESTINATION: Your 2 Anchored non-Home Bernals & Return.
imageDescription: Card depicting a rotating space habitat with multiple modules and solar panels, representing a Bernal sphere-style space station in deep space.

name: Isotope Fueling Station
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: After you do a factory refuel op, gain 1 Isotope at that Factory. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site. DESTINATION: Your Factory of your isostandard in Neptune zone.
imageDescription: Card showing a spacecraft mining operation on a cratered asteroid near Neptune's moon, with storage tanks and equipment visible on the surface.

name: Warden Proving Ground
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Your robonauts are -1 ISRU. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank; Promote your freighter or you may gain a Mobile Factory at your Bank. DESTINATION: Teharonhiyawako (10:20).
imageDescription: Card depicting multiple robotic rovers operating on the surface of Teharonhiyawako, a gray cratered asteroid, testing autonomous systems.

name: TW Evaluation Committee
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: You may use Claim disks as delegates. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site; place 2 delegates on any 1 ideology. DESTINATION: Larissa (10:10).
imageDescription: Card showing Earth from space with a thruster spacecraft in orbit, representing committee evaluation of terrawatt-class propulsion systems.

name: Radiation Shield Prototype
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Your Stacks are immune to Belt/CME Rolls. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank. DESTINATION: Mercury Site (6:30, 8:00), then enter 2 Radiation Belt Spaces in the Saturn zone or beyond & Return.
imageDescription: Card depicting a spacecraft with thruster firing near Pluto, the dwarf planet shown as a large pinkish-gray sphere with its distinctive heart feature.

name: Rival Isobank
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: You may exchange 1 Isotope per Turn at your Anchored non-Home Bernal for 6 Aquas. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site. DESTINATION: Pluto or Charon Factory (9:40, 9:50).
imageDescription: Card showing a space station with HE-3 isotope storage tanks silhouetted against a large full moon, representing an isotope banking facility.

name: TW Stress Test
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Your GW/TW thruster receives a Bonus Pivot. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank. DESTINATION: Enter Solar Oberth, then Uranus zone Synodic Site, & Return.
imageDescription: Card depicting a spacecraft with extended thruster boom performing a close solar pass, with the sun's corona and surface prominently displayed.

name: Iso-Exchange
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Produce your isostandard during a site refuel op at any Factory (with permission). WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank. DESTINATION: Saturn aerostat (8:40) & Return.
imageDescription: Card showing a bulbous spacecraft or aerostat with multiple spherical tanks floating in Saturn's atmosphere, designed for isotope collection.

name: Deep Freeze
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Before exomigrating, you may Discard the top card from the queue you are drawing from. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site. DESTINATION: Arrokoth (9:50).
imageDescription: Card depicting multiple humans in blue cryogenic hibernation pods with tubes and monitoring equipment, representing deep freeze colonist storage.

name: Atmospheric Iso-Refinery
ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: If your GW/TW thruster ends its move on an Aerobrake Hazard, that Stack gains 1 Isotope. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank. DESTINATION: Uranus aerostat (9:20).
imageDescription: Card showing a dragonfly-like atmospheric collection craft with transparent wings flying through Uranus's pale blue-green cloudy atmosphere.
